subject: F1 25 Not working
description_text:
Good morning,

I recently received my Simsonn pro plus pedals and I am trying to play F1 25. I updated the software and it said there is F1 25 support, but on the games list I don't see F1 25 and the game is not able to assign the pedals to accelerate or brake.

respectfully,
Nolan

conversations.body_text: Hi Nolan Merdan,  F1 2025 is fully compatible and works very well in our test environment. May I ask if your Pro Plus pedals have been successfully calibrated? If you are still unable to bind the device, could you please provide a video showing the issue? This will help us identify the problem more quickly and offer an appropriate solution.Â
